description:
This plugin allows you to spawn multiple window boxes with custom properties.

The windows are treated as Pictures and are stored in the same queue as them. To remove a window you spawned with this plugin, use the Remove Picture command. If you display a Picture with the same ID as a custom window, the window will be overwritten, and vice-versa. Use negative IDs for the windows. If you use positive IDs, they'll be drawn on top of other screen elements.
name: Multiple window boxes
